io.realm

Interface UserStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SharedPrefsUserStore

    public interface UserStore
    See Also:
    SyncManager.setUserStore(UserStore), SharedPrefsUserStore
    This software is considered in beta phase. It indicates that any public interface can change without prior announcements. Moreover, classes, constructors, and methods annotated as beta are not considered at production quality, and should be used with care.
    Interface for classes responsible for saving and retrieving Object Server users again.

    Any implementation of a User Store is expected to not perform lengthy blocking operations as it might be called on the Main Thread. All implementations of this interface should be thread safe.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CURRENT_USER_KEY 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<SyncUser> allUsers()
      Returns a collection of all users saved in the User store.
      void clear()
      Removes all saved users.
      SyncUser get(String key)
      Retrieves the SyncUser with the given key.
      SyncUser put(String key, SyncUser user)
      Saves a SyncUser object under the given key.
      SyncUser remove(String key)
      Removes the user with the given key from the store.

    • Field Detail

      • CURRENT_USER_KEY

        static final String CURRENT_USER_KEY
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • put

        SyncUser put(String key,
             SyncUser user)
        Saves a SyncUser object under the given key. If another user already exists, it will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        key - key used to store the User.
        user - SyncUser object to store.
        Returns:
        The previous user saved with this key or null if no user was replaced.

      • get

        SyncUser get(String key)
        Retrieves the SyncUser with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - SyncUser saved under the given key or null if no user exists for that key.

      • remove

        SyncUser remove(String key)
        Removes the user with the given key from the store.
        Parameters:
        key - key for the user to remove.
        Returns:
        SyncUser that was removed or null if no user matched the key.

      • allUsers

        Collection<SyncUser> allUsers()
        Returns a collection of all users saved in the User store.
        Returns:
        Collection of all users. If no users exist, an empty collection is returned.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all saved users.
